sourcesContent:
Admin

Get All Bill Reports By Year

Consumer ID Required!!
Year Required!!
  • BillID: {{ bill.billId }}, ConsumerID: {{ bill.consumerId.consumerId }}, Month: {{ bill.month }}, Year: {{ bill.year }}, Units Consumed: {{ bill.unitsConsumed }}, Total Bill Amount: {{ bill.totalAmount }}
No Bills Found!
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-consumer-get-bills-by-year-form', templateUrl: './consumer-get-bills-by-year-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./consumer-get-bills-by-year-form.component.css'] }) export class ConsumerGetBillsByYearFormComponent { }
